segments.text: Hello , Joanna . You are looking very charming in the new dress .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it suits you very well . It certainly is unique . I don ’ t think I ’ Ve seen anything like it before .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . That ’ s why I bought it . I hate wearing the same styles like everybody else is wearing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And the necklace , it matches your dress marvelously .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s very nice of you to say so . I should say you are glamorous yourself , as a matter of fact .
segments.speaker: S2
